title: Drawing, "General Palmer's House, Glen Eyrie, Colorado", 1892
signed: Signed in graphite?, lower left: T. Moran.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite ?, lower left corner: Gen. Palmer's House Glen Eyrie, Col. / T. Moran; again notations throughout such as: trees / Bushes / colors; again over top of houses: Red Roof; again over far right house: Palmer's House; and again over same house shown in larger scale at above right: House Red x Gray.

Verso: Inscribed in ?: No. 160.
description: Horizontal view of a valley with wild rock formations, with a few houses lying in the right center. Far right house is shown in greater scale above at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "General Palmer's House, Glen Eyrie, Colorado", 1892.
1892. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-58.
